description: Creo display parameters used to create drawing views

data.name: remove_quilt_hidden_lines
data.description: Whether to remove quilt hidden lines

data.name: show_concept_model
data.description: Whether to show the concept model

data.name: style
data.valid_values: default, follow_environment, hidden_line, no_hidden, shaded, wireframe

data.name: tangent_style
data.valid_values: default, centerline, dimmed, none, phantom, solid
